question: Which award did Manny Pangilinan receive?

content.source_1:
**Breaking News: Business Tycoon Manny Pangilinan Honored as One of Asia's Most Influential Philippines**

Manila, Philippines - In a prestigious recognition of his outstanding contributions to the business world, Manny Pangilinan, Chairman and President of Metro Pacific Investments Corporation, has been awarded the esteemed title of Asia's Most Influential Philippines by Tatler Asia. This coveted distinction is a testament to Pangilinan's remarkable leadership and vision, which have transformed the Philippine business landscape. Under his guidance, Metro Pacific Investments Corporation has become a dominant player in the country's infrastructure development, with a diverse portfolio of projects in transportation, energy, and healthcare. "Manny Pangilinan is a true icon in the Philippine business community," said Lance Gokongwei, President and CEO of JG Summit Holdings. "His innovative approach and commitment to nation-building have inspired a new generation of entrepreneurs and business leaders." According to Tatler Asia, the Asia's Most Influential Philippines list recognizes individuals who have made a significant impact in their respective fields, demonstrating exceptional leadership, innovation, and philanthropy. Pangilinan's inclusion in this elite group is a nod to his tireless efforts to drive economic growth and improve the lives of Filipinos. Data from the Philippine Statistics Authority reveals that Metro Pacific Investments Corporation's projects have generated thousands of jobs and contributed significantly to the country's GDP growth. The company's investments in infrastructure development have also improved the overall quality of life for millions of Filipinos. "Manny Pangilinan's influence extends beyond the business sector," said Dr. Bernardo Villegas, a renowned economist and professor at the University of Asia and the Pacific. "He has been a vocal advocate for good governance and has worked closely with the government to promote sustainable development." In response to the award, Pangilinan expressed his gratitude and humility, stating, "This recognition is not just a personal honor, but a testament to the hard work and dedication of the entire Metro Pacific team. We will continue to strive for excellence and make a positive impact on the lives of Filipinos." With this prestigious award, Manny Pangilinan solidifies his position as one of the most influential business leaders in the Philippines, inspiring a new generation of entrepreneurs and cementing his legacy as a champion of economic growth and development.
content.source_2: As the sun set over the bustling streets of Manila, Manny Pangilinan, the visionary chairman and president of Metro Pacific Investments Corporation, stood tall, his eyes gleaming with pride. He had just received the prestigious Norsk Form Honours Award, a testament to his unwavering commitment to design excellence. The ceremony, held at the sleek and modern National Museum of the Philippines, was abuzz with the who's who of the country's business and design communities. Manny, resplendent in his tailored black tuxedo, mingled effortlessly with the guests, his warm smile and firm handshake putting everyone at ease. As he made his way to the stage, the soft glow of the LED lights casting an ethereal ambiance, Manny's thoughts drifted back to the early days of his career. He remembered the countless late nights spent poring over blueprints, the endless meetings with architects and engineers, and the unwavering dedication to creating spaces that not only served a purpose but also inspired the human spirit. The presenter, a statuesque Norwegian designer with a flair for the dramatic, took the microphone and began to speak in a voice that commanded attention. "Ladies and gentlemen, it is our great honor to present the Norsk Form Honours Award to a true pioneer in the field of design excellence. Manny Pangilinan's tireless efforts to push the boundaries of innovation and sustainability have resulted in some of the most iconic structures in the Philippines. His commitment to creating spaces that are not only functional but also beautiful is a testament to his unwavering passion for design." As the audience erupted into applause, Manny's eyes locked onto the sleek, silver trophy, its curves and lines a masterpiece of Scandinavian design. He felt a sense of pride and gratitude wash over him, knowing that this award was not just a recognition of his own achievements but also a testament to the hard work and dedication of his team. As he accepted the award, Manny's thoughts turned to the future, to the next great project that would challenge him to push the boundaries of what was possible. He knew that this award was not an endpoint but a catalyst, a reminder that the pursuit of design excellence was a lifelong journey, one that required constant innovation, creativity, and passion.
